DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect everyday practice modality ( mammography , US ) MIRA technology .
DOC.brief_title: Imaging Modality Effects Multi-dimensional InfraRed Analysis ( MIRA ) Technology
DOC.detailed_description: The objective current clinical study collect sufficient MIRA image data subject arrive routine screening mammography , undergo mammography . This order reach conclusion whether firm breast compression involve mammography procedure affect performance MIRA technology . At current stage development device , goal clinical trial way arrive statistical analysis .
DOC.criteria: Gender : female Age : 50 year old Subjects summon routine screening mammography , ultrasound , diagnostic mammography breast biopsy . Subject sign informed consent form . Subjects mammography , ultrasound , and/or MRI examination perform day study , PRIOR FIRST image session RealImager . Subjects undergone type breast surgery throughout 6 week precede study . Subjects breast biopsy perform throughout 6 week precede study . Subjects undergone mastectomy . Subjects undergone lumpectomy . Subjects large scar ( cause breast deformation ) . Subjects previously undergone currently undergo breast radiation therapy . Subjects previously undergone currently undergo chemotherapy . Subjects prior breast reduction surgery breast augmentation surgery . Subjects pregnant . Subjects breastfeed .
